statements: SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name, game_strategy FROM Coaches ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT coach_id, coach_name FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Coaches WHERE coach_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT coach_id, coach_name, training_drills FROM Coaches WHERE game_strategy = 'Defensive Strategies';
SELECT coach_name, game_strategy FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id > 2 ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT coach_name, performance_evaluations FROM Coaches WHERE LENGTH(training_drills) > 100;
SELECT coach_name, training_drills FROM Coaches WHERE game_strategy LIKE '%aggressive%';
SELECT coach_name, game_strategy FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY coach_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name, strategy FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_id, coach_name FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Training;
SELECT drill_name, coach_id FROM Training WHERE coach_id = 201;
SELECT coach_id, coach_name FROM Coaches WHERE strategy = 'Aggressive';
SELECT * FROM Coaches WHERE coach_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY coach_id DESC;
SELECT training_id, drill_name, coach_name FROM Training JOIN Coaches ON Training.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id WHERE Training.coach_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Coaches INNER JOIN Training ON Coaches.coach_id = Training.coach_id ORDER BY coach_id, training_id DESC;
SELECT coach_id, AVG(training_id) AS avg_training_id FROM Training GROUP BY coach_id HAVING COUNT(training_id) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_id, name, team FROM Coaches ORDER BY coach_id DESC;
SELECT name, team FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM GameStrategies WHERE coach_id = 3;
SELECT strategy_name, coach_id FROM GameStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT name, team FROM Coaches WHERE team = 'Basketball';
SELECT * FROM GameStrategies JOIN Coaches ON GameStrategies.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id;
SELECT drill_name, name FROM TrainingDrills JOIN Coaches ON TrainingDrills.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id WHERE Coaches.name = 'John Doe';
SELECT Evaluation_id, evaluation_score FROM PerformanceEvaluations WHERE coach_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT drill_name, drill_duration FROM TrainingDrills WHERE coach_id = 2 ORDER BY drill_duration DESC;
SELECT coach_id, strategy_description FROM GameStrategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT evaluation_date, evaluation_result FROM PerformanceEvaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM Coaches WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM Coaches WHERE team_name = 'Team B' ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameStrategies WHERE coach_id = 2 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT drill_name, drill_duration FROM TrainingDrills WHERE coach_id = 3 AND drill_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM Coaches;
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM Coaches ORDER BY coach_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM GameStrategies WHERE coach_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM TrainingDrills WHERE duration_in_minutes > 30;
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM Coaches WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM Coaches;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, description FROM GameStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT drill_name, duration_in_minutes FROM TrainingDrills WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name AS Coach, evaluation_date AS Date, performance_score AS Score FROM Coaches JOIN PerformanceEvaluations ON Coaches.coach_id = PerformanceEvaluations.coach_id;
SELECT coach_name, COUNT(*) AS strategy_count FROM Coaches JOIN GameStrategies ON Coaches.coach_id = GameStrategies.coach_id GROUP BY coach_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY strategy_count DESC;
